overview: We all know blind dating can be such a chore, but it doesn't have to be. Think of it as an excuse to try new things, just like a new food, a new person might be worth a try? Who knows, you might really like the taste! Join these sexy singles as they play the dating game and see who has the best time. This horny group is sure to take a chance on one and other, testing the waters of sexual pleasure and passionate eroticism.
title: Blind Date
